loans.name: G.s. Unidas En Cristo Group

texts.es: El grupo Solidario Unidas En Cristo está conformado por Maria Auxiliadora y Factora ambas tienen diferentes actividad económicas. Maria se dedica a la venta de abarrotería desde hace mas de 20 años pues inicio desde muy joven y está ubicado en su vivienda en donde todos los días en muy solicitado por diferentes clientes, ella es una persona muy responsable y unida con su compañera Factora que también trabaja su negocio es la venta de ropa usada, hace mas de 17 años que tiene esta actividad. Ella ha demostrado que no es fácil salir adelante con sus 57 años posee una gran experiencia. Ahora se han unido para solicitar este crédito para la compra de materia prima.
texts.en:
The "Unidas en Cristo" [United in Christ] Solidarity Group is made up by Maria Auxiliadora and Factora. Both have different economic activities. Maria has been selling groceries for more than 20 years. She started at a very young age. Her business is located in her home, where many different customers stop by every day. She is a very responsible person. 

She is close to her fellow group member, Factora, who also works. Her business is the sale of used clothes. She has been doing this activity for more than 17 years. She has proven that it is not easy to get ahead. At age 57, she has great experience. Now they have come together to ask for this loan for the purchase of raw materials.

loans.use: Supplies for work

loans.name: G.s. Montes De Los Olivos Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Montes De Los Olivos está compuesto por la señora Sofía y Arelys. Sofía aduce que este negocio le ha ayudado a tener buenos ingresos, lo que le ha permitido seguir manteniendo a sus tres hijos menores de edad. Algo que agradece a Fundación León 2000 es que con este préstamo ella incremento su inventario, aumento sus ventas y por ende logro mejorar las condiciones de vida que ella poseía, y hasta ha realizado algunas mejoras a su vivienda. Ella sueña en el futuro es que desea establecer una pulpería en su domicilio y sobre todo desea que sus hijos se puedan preparar en la universidad. Por lo que ambas solicitan financiamientos para mejorar sus negocios.
texts.en: The solidarity group "Montes de Los Olivos" [mountains of olives] is composed of Sofía and Arelys.  Sofía explains that this business has helped her have a good income, which has allowed her to continue supporting her three young children.  She is grateful to the Fundación León 2000 because with this loan she increased her inventory, increased her sales and therefore was able to improve the quality of life that she had, and she has also made a few improvements to her house.  She dreams that in the future she can set up a local grocery store in her home and above all she wants her kids to be able to study in college.  For these reasons both apply for financing to improve their businesses.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Juan Amilcar

texts.es: El señor Juan Amílcar tiene 62 años, es casado y tiene 6 hijos, ya son mayores de edad. El señor se dedica a la apicultura. El señor dio inicio a este negocio hace 10 años, primeramente el trabaja con una empresa que realizaba este negocio y después, con el tiempo y con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro pudo hacerse de su propia actividad que es el que actualmente posee. El señor está solicitando este crédito ya que piensa comprar pinza, combustible, trajes entre otras cosas que son útiles para la producción de miel. El mayor desafió que siempre ha tenido él como empresario ha sido que algunas veces no ha tenido muchas ventas. De allí nace que su mayor sueño siempre ha sido establecer una empresa familiar y que sus hijos puedan trabajar con él.
texts.en: Juan Amílcar is 62 years old, he is married and has 6 adult children. He engages in beekeeping. He started this activity 10 years ago; at first he was working for a company working in this field, then, in time, with great effort and by saving, he has been able to start his own activity, which is what he now possesses. He is requesting this loan in order to buy tongs, fuel, overalls and other things that are useful to produce honey. The biggest challenge he has always had to face as an employer is the occasional lack of sales. For this reason his biggest dream has always been to establish a family-owned company and that his children can work with him.

loans.use: To increase his working capital.

loans.name: Mercedes Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Mercedes Del Carmen, es madre soltera con dos hijos menores de edad. La señora  tiene su negocio que es la venta de comida localizada en su casa de habitación, en la cual vende sus platillos como gallo pinto, tajadas, queso frito, refrescos, tortas, maduro entre otros. Hace más de cuatro años que se dedica a este negocio, el cual inicio como una alternativa,  debido a que tenía a sus hijos que alimentar, por lo que se armó de valor y decidió establecerlo. Su crédito será invertido en la compra de granos básicos que son necesarios para su negocio. El deseo por el momento es trabajar duro para capitalizar el negocio, de tal forma que pueda en un futuro realizar mejoras a su casita, y brindarles mayores comodidades a sus dos hijos.
texts.en: Mercedes Del Carmen is a single mother with two young children. She has a business in which she sells food from her home. She sells dishes such as gallo pinto (a rice and beans dish), plantains, fried cheese, soft drinks, and cakes, among others. She has been in business for four years, which she started because she has children to feed. It took courage to decide to establish her business. The loan will be used to buy basic grains that are necessary for her business. Her desire at the moment is to work hard so she can capitalize her business so that in the future she can improve her house and improve the quality of life of her children.

loans.use: to buy basic grains

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase electronics to sell in the store

loans.name: Anita

texts.es: Anita tiene 43 años,  su negocio es la venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio. Ella es una madre responsable y emprendedora tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo que este negocio por lo que tiene que mantener a sus 2 hijos que son menores de edad. Ella tiene una gran variedad de clientes pues siempre sale a vender sus diferentes productos a sus vecinos, amigos y familiares. Ella necesita este financiamiento para la compra de materia prima pues hasta los momentos tiene bastante pedidos que le han solicitado.
texts.en: Anita is 43 years old.  She has been selling cosmetics for the last four years.  She is a hardworking and responsible mother, with two children.  Her business helps her care for her children.  She has a wide client base, since she always goes around selling different kinds of products to her neighbors, friends, and relatives.  She will use this loan to buy stock, as she has a lot of orders to fill at the moment.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Gavino Marcelino

texts.es: El señor Gavino Marcelino C. V.,  es un hombre mayor de edad de 50 años habita en el conocido Barrio Laureles Norte, lugar de alta delincuencia, él es un hombre soltero sin hijos, que se dedica a la costura y comercializa productos de la Avon, desde hace mas de 25 años se dedica a la costura, y ha sido el sustento económico de su vida, y fue un amigo quien le enseño a ganarse la vida con esta actividad, en el año es normal que las ventas de los productos  de la Avon tiendan a subir y bajar, pero él quiere aprovechar las ventas de diciembre y ofertar sus productos de la Avon, así mismo comprar materia prima para realzar las ofertas de trabajo que se le presenten en esta temporada que se acerca navideña, esta inversión le permitirá mejores condiciones económicas que puede a futuro realizar una remodelaciones a la infraestructura de su hogar, y mejorar las condiciones socio económicas con las que sobrevive.
texts.en: Gavino Marcelino C. V. is over 50 years old and lives in the Barrio Laureles Norte, a run-down area.  He is a single man without children.  He makes his living by sewing and by selling Avon products.  He has been making his living as a tailor for more than 25 years, after a friend taught him the trade.  Over the course of a year, sales of Avon products normally rise and fall, but he wants to take advantage of the December sales to offer more Avon products.  He also wants to buy raw materials for the tailoring orders he has for the Christmas season.  This loan will allow him to improve his economic conditions, and in the future, he hopes to renovate his house and reapir its infrastructure and thus raise his socioeconomic level.

loans.use: To buy Avon products and fabric for sewing orders

loans.name: Maritza Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Maritza del Socorro N. D., tiene la edad de 36 años habita en el barrio Waspan Norte, es casada y su esposo labora como Guarda de Seguridad, aportando a la economía del hogar, tienen 2 hijos menores de edad que estudian  la primaria en un colegio público, ella tiene un pequeño puesto de comida rápida y refrescos, desde hace mas de tres años, este pasado invierno las ventas bajaron de sobremanera por las afectaciones de las fuertes lluvias, pero espera que esto cambie con la llegada de las temporada navideñas, y es para su negocio que solicita un préstamo para la compra de unos termos que mantengan fríos los refrescos para su venta, así mismo invertirá el crédito en la compra de materia prima para su comidiera, espera que con esta inversión las ventas mejoren y a futuro le brinden los recursos económicos para la apertura de un comedor en un mercado capitalino, de esta manera el desarrollo socio económico de su familia.
texts.en:
Maritza, from the N. D. Socorro Association, is 36 years old and lives in the North Waspan neighborhood. She is married and her husband works as a security guard, contributing to the household economy. They have 2 minor children studying in a primary public school.

She has been operating a small stand of fast food and refreshments for over three years. This past winter sales were down tremendously due to the effects of heavy rains, but this is expected to change with the arrival of the Christmas season.

It is for her business that she is seeking a loan to buy a few thermos containers to keep refreshments cool enough for sale. and likewise will invest the loan in purchasing basic ingredients for the stand.

She hopes that this investment will improve sales, and that in the future she will have the financial resources to open a dining room in a market in the capital city, and in this way support the socio-economic development of her family.

loans.use: Buy utensils for her business

loans.name: Haydalina

texts.es: La señora Haydalina tiene 46 años, ya que vive con su familia. La señora tiene un negocio de venta de cerdos y gallina. La señora dio inicio a este negocio desde hace 5 años, ella inicio por la necesidad de obtener un trabajo que le generara ingresos para su hogar, ya que todos los días se levanta temprano pues tiene que encargarse de los quehaceres del hogar y de su negocio. Ella actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para satisfacer unos pedidos de clientes. Ella ha querido realizar unos arreglos para guardar a los animales.
texts.en:
Haydalina is 46 years old, and lives with her family. This lady runs a business selling pigs and chickens. She started this business 5 years ago, as she needed to get a job to generate income for their home.

Each day she wakes up early to take care of household chores and her business. She is currently seeking a loan to meet customer orders. She would like to make a few adjustments to the animal enclosures.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Lesbia Mayerly

texts.es: La señora Lesbia Mayerly P. C. es una joven de 29 años, vive en el Barrio Villa Libertad,  es casada y con su esposo tienen un taller que brinda servicios de reparación de Refrigeradoras y Aires Acondicionados así mismo labora como profesor en el Colegio Pureza de Maria,  ellos tienen 3 hijos menores de edad que estudian la primaria,  ella ha sufrido múltiples problemas de salud y las ofertas de trabajo han bajado, ahora que se encuentra más estable de salud solicita un préstamo para la ampliación de su taller, con el crédito comprara los materiales para u taller y legalizara la empresa, es para ellos de suma importancia  su solicitud, esta inversión les bridara una mayor estabilidad con la empresa y la comodidad a su clientela.
texts.en:
Mrs. Lesbia Mayerly P. C. is a 29-year-old lady living in the neighborhood of Villa Libertad. She is married and with her husband run a shop providing repair services for refrigerators and air conditioners.

He also works as a professor at the Colegio Pureza de Maria. They have 3 minor children all in elementary school.

She has had multiple health problems and the requests for repair services have decreased. Now that her health is more stable she is requesting a loan to expand her business. 

She will use the loan to purchase materials for the workshop and legalize the business. This request is of the utmost importance to them, as it will bring greater stability to their business and comfort to their customers.

loans.use: With the loan she will purchase materials for the workshop and legalize the business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Maintain plant health

loans.name: Cecilia Ignacia

texts.es: Cecilia Ignacia tiene 54 años, su actividad es abarrotería. En su vivienda que es donde está ubicado su negocio, llegan una gran variedad de clientes a buscar los diferentes productos que solicitan. Hace más de 9 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que no es la primera vez que solicita créditos, ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y que paga sus cuotas en tiempo y forma. Inicio porque no tenía los ingresos necesarios para mantener a su familia. Este crédito es para la compra de arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, maíz entre otros.
texts.en:
Cecilia Ignacia is 54 years old and runs a grocery store. A wide variety of customers come to her home where her business is located to find the different products they need.

She has been running this business for more than nine years, so it is not the first time she has applied for a loan. She has proven to be a responsible person who pays her dues in a timely manner. She started her business because she had no income to support her family.

This loan will be used to purchase rice, beans, oil, sugar, corn among others.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Maria Aryera

texts.es: La señora Maria Aryera U. T., tiene la edad de 29 años, habita en el barrio Veracruz, es una joven casada, que tiene 2 hijos menores de edad el cual uno de ellos cursa el tercer nivel de preescolar, ellos se dedican al negocio del comercio desde hace mas de 3 años el cual ha sido su principal fuente de ingresos, ellos a futuro esperan tener los recursos para comprar un tramo en el mercado puesto que el arrendamiento de uno de estos es muy caro, ellos solicitan un préstamo para la compra de un mayor inventario de productos tales como ropa y zapatos, que favorezcan a los niveles de ventas y poco  a poco mejorar las condiciones de habitad de su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Aryera U. T. is 29 years old and lives in the Veracruz neighbourhood. She is married and has two small children of whom one is in the third year of kindergarten.

For over three years their main source of income has been commercial trade. In the future they hope to have the resources to purchase a booth in the market.

Since leasing one of these is very expensive, they are requesting a loan to purchase a larger inventory of products such as clothing and shoes, that will boost sales levels and gradually improve their family’s living conditions.

loans.use: Buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Cisne Azul Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Cisne Azul. Se encuentra ubicado en el Estado D. PuebL.. El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes. Georgina Elena L. es L. presidente del grupo. Tiene 44 años, estudió hasta el 6to año  D. primaria, se dedica a L. venta D. Durazno y Chiles Secos.  ElL. se dedica a cultivar el durazno, chiles secos  y venD. en diferentes poblaciones que inició hace 20 años. Solicita el préstamo para compra D. fertilizantes. Sus clientes son el público en general.  Al momento D. solicitar este préstamo se siente entusiasmada con muchas ganas D. sobresalir.   Quiere este crédito para L. compra D. fertilizantes ya que debe D. tener en buen estado sus árboles D. durazno. También espera con este préstamo obtener mejores ganancias y así obtener más clientes para poder tener una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Cisne Azul' (Blue Swan).  It is located in the state of PuebL..  The group has 9 members.  Georgina Elena L. is the group's president.  She is 44 years old and studied up to the sixth year of elementary school.  She works selling peaches and dried chilis.  She grows the peaches and chilis and sells them in different towns.  She began this business 20 years ago.

She is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers.  Her customers are the general public.  As she requests this loan she is feeling very enthusiastic and has a great desire to succeed.  She would like this loan to buy fertilizers since she must have her peach trees in good condition.  She would also like to use this loan to obtain more customers and thereby make better profits so that she can have a better standard of living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: El señor Rafael Antonio G. C., tiene la edad de 35 años, habita en el Reparto Juan Ramón Padilla es casado, ellos tienen un hijo de 16 años que se dedica a estudiar la escuela de secundaria, su negocio es una pulpería desde hace 3 años, su esposa le brinda su apoyo administrativo, el negocio que se ha convertido en la principal fuente de ingresos de la familia G., dentro de las dificultades que  les han afectado ha sido una enfermedad inesperada que golpeo a toda la familia, es para su miscelánea que solicita un préstamo para la compra de un mayor inventario de Abarrotes, Lácteos, Golosinas, gaseosas, etc. Que favorezcan a mejores ventas y los recursos a nuevos fuentes de ingresos para el mejor desarrollo socio económico de su hijo sobretodo que pronto entrara a la universidad y esperan tener las condiciones para favorecerlo en sus estudios profesionales.
texts.en: Rafael Antonio G. C. is 35 years old.  He lives in the Juan Ramón Padilla division.  He is married and has a 16 year-old son who is studying at high school.  His business is a small grocery store which he has had for 3 years.  His wife supports him in running the business.  It has become the main source of income for the G. family.  Amongst the difficulties which they have faced has been an unexpected illness which hit the whole family.  It is for his general store that he is requesting this loan so that he can purchase a larger inventory of groceries, dairy products, sweets, sodas, etc.  He hopes for better sales and new sources of income to improve the socio-economic development of  his son because he will soon start university and they hope to be able to be in a position to support him in his professional studies.

loans.use: To buy a larger inventory of merchandise

loans.name: Marcia Salvadora

texts.es: Marcia Salvadora tiene 40 años. Su actividad económica es la venta de mercadería en general. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos para su negocio pues han sido de gran ayuda. Hace más de 11 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy difícil salir adelante con todas las cosas que ha atravesado. Ella es una persona muy luchadora que disfruta de su negocio y de interactuar con sus clientes. Este crédito es para la compra de materia prima que es necesaria para su negocio.
texts.en: Marcia Salvadora is 40 years old.  Her business activity is selling general merchandise.  This is not the first time that she has requested a loan for her business and they have been a great help.  She has had this business for more than 11 years.  It has been very difficult for her to get ahead with all the things that she has experienced but she is a fighter who enjoys her business and enjoys interacting with her customers.  This loan will be used to buy supplies that she needs for her business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: María Emérita

texts.es:
María Emérita tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera y no cuenta con hijos dependientes, vive junto a sus padres el el caserío La Colorada del distrito de Mórrope, una zona agrícola que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores. Ella cría sus animales en un ambiente ubicado dentro de su vivienda y los vende a sus vecinos y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a sus padres con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia. 

María desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más animales y alimento balanceado, de modo que pueda ampliar sus ventas y percibir mayores ganancias. Asimismo desea realizar algunas mejoras en sus corrales. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

María es una mujer empeñosa y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Ella planea trabajar arduamente para seguir colaborando con el desarrollo de su familia.
texts.en:
María Emérita is 24 years old.  She is single and has no dependent children.  She lives with her parents in the village of La Colorada in the district of Mórrope, an agricultural region which is located in the province of Lambayeque, more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

She raises and sells young animals.  She raises her animals on her property and sells them to neighbors and dealers who usually visit the area where she lives.  The income that she makes from this activity is used to cover her personal expenses and to help her parents in supporting the family financially.

María would like to expand her business with the purchase of more animals and balanced feed so that she can increase her sales and make more profit.  She would also like to make some improvements in her pens.  This is why she has made her first loan request from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 nuevos soles.

María is a determined woman who has a great desire to get ahead.  She plans to work hard in order to continue contributing to the development of her family.

loans.use: To buy animals and balanced feed in order to expand her business of raising and selling animals

loans.name: Delicia

texts.es:
Delicia tiene 44 años de edad, es soltera y tiene un hijo dependiente. Reside junto a sus padres en el sector urbano del distrito de Mochumí, una zona agrícola que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Lambayeque, a media hora de camino de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la comercialización de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega que tiene instalada en su domicilio ubicado en una de las calles céntricas de su distrito. Su negocio ya tiene más de cinco años de antigüedad y debido a ello cuenta con una clientela fiel que prefiere la calidad de productos que brinda y el buen trato que ofrece.

Delicia desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más productos con los cuales pueda satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y aumentar sus ingresos por ventas. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer bastante responsable y entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir trabajando para poder sacarlos adelante y ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Delicia is 44 years old and has1 dependent son. She is a single mother and lives with her parents in the urban sector of Mochumi district, a farming community located in Lambayeque province, half an hour by road from Chiclayo city. 

Delicia sells basic household goods and groceries in a general store set up in her house, which is on a centrally located street in her district. Her business is already more than 5 years old and has a loyal customer base because of the high quality of the products Delicia stocks, and the good customer service she offers.

She wishes to expand her business by acquiring more products to meet the needs of her customers and thus increase her sales income. For this reason she has found it necessary to request her first loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 PEN, which will help her achieve her goal.

Delicia is a very responsible woman who is devoted to her family. Her greatest wish is to be able to provide her family with a better quality of life through her work.

loans.use: Purchase of basic household goods and groceries to expand business.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
Rubén tiene 35 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a su padre en el distrito de Paiján, una zona perteneciente a la provincia de Ascope, en la región La Libertad, ubicada a dos horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar ofreciendo servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en un vehículo motorizado llamado mototaxi, el se vale de esta labor para ganarse la vida, por lo que diariamente se esfuerza por sacar adelante su negocio, usualmente transporta pasajeros dentro del mismo distrito de Paiján y sus anexos. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad los utiliza en solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar a su padre con la economía del hogar.

Rubén ya ha trabajado con un crédito financiado por el Fondo Kiva. Con ese préstamo el pudo brindar mantenimiento a su vehículo y seguir y trabajando. Ahora el solicita el crédito para adquirir algunos respuestos y accesorios que le garanticen el correcto funcionamiento de su vehículo, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 muevos soles.

Rubén se encuentra bastante agradecido con las personas que colaboraron con el a través del programa Kiva. El es un hombre honrado y trabajador, su mayor anhelo es poder brindarle a su padre una mejor calidad de vida, sus vecinos y compañeros de trabajo le tienen mucha estima y le consideran alguien de confianza.
texts.en:
Rubén is 35 years old, single, and lives with his father in the district of Paiján, a zone belonging to Ascope province in the region of La Libertad, which is two and a half hours from Chiclayo city, capital of Lambayeque.

He works in transportation, carrying cargo and passengers in a motorized vehicle called a "moto-taxi". Rubén depends on this activity to earn a living, and works hard every day, usually transporting passengers within Paiján district and the surrounding areas. The income he earns from this activity are used to pay his personal expenses and to help his father with household expenses.

Rubén has already received a loan financed by Kiva. With that loan he was able to maintain his vehicle and keep working. He now requests a loan to buy some parts and accessories that will keep his moto-taxi running properly. For this reason he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 PEN.

Rubén is very grateful to the people who collaborated with him through Kiva. He is an honest and hardworking man and his greatest wish is to provide his father with a better quality of life. Rubén's neighbors and work colleagues respect him as someone they can trust.

loans.use: Moto-taxi (tuk tuk) repair and maintenance costs.

loans.name: María Zoila

texts.es:
María Zoila tiene 32 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos dependientes, reside junto a sus padres en el caserío Sasape Viejo del distrito de Túcume, una zona agrícola y turística que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra situada aproximadamente a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace diez años a brindar servicio de peluquería en un local alquilado situado en el pueblo principal de Túcume. Allí ella ofrece a sus clientes servicio de corte de cabello, ondulaciones, tintes de cabello entre otros. El negocio cuenta con buena acogida debido al tiempo que lleva trabajando en el rubro y a la calidad de sus trabajos.

Ella desea adquirir algunas herramientas e insumos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de atención y mejorar su negocio. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

María es una mujer bastante empeñosa y entregada a su trabajo, los ingresos que percibe de su actividad los utiliza para solventar sus gastos personas y ayudar a la economía de su familia. Su mayor anhelo es salir adelante para poder ayudar a sus padres a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Zoila is 32 years old.  She is single and doesn't have any dependent children.  She lives with her parents in the village of Sasape Viejo in the district of Túcume, a farming and tourist region which is in the province of Lambayeque, approximately one hour from the city of Chiclayo.

She has been running a hairdressing salon for ten years in rented premises located in the main town of Túcume.  There she offers her customers hair-cutting services, perms, hair coloring, etc.  Her business has a lot of customers owing to the amount of time she has been in the trade and the quality of her work.

She would like to acquire some equipment and supplies which will enable her to improve the quality of her customer service and improve her business.  This is why she is requesting her first loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 nuevos soles.

María is quite a determined woman who is committed to her work.  The income which she earns from her business is used to cover her personal expenses and help with her family's finances.  Her greatest wish is to get ahead in order to help her parents and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: To buy equipment and supplies for making improvements to her hair-dressing salon

loans.name: Yahia

texts.en:
Yahia is a young man from Jabalia refugee camp. Married and a father of two daughters and one son, Yahia is a Palestinian NationA. Authority employee. Yahia started a private business, a poultry farm, to increase the family's income.

Yahia came to FATEN to take a loan and purchase feed and chicks to raise and sell. Yahia could in two years build a good database of individuals and shops to sell his chicken. The farm is helping Yahia taking care of his big family.

Yahia appears in the picture here in his farm in Jabalia refugee camp.

loans.use: To purchase feed and chicks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To renew his car's engine

loans.name: Annabella

texts.en:
Annabella B. is from the village of Poblacion 3, Clarin Misamis Occidental. She is 37 years old. Annabella is married and has four school-aged children. To make a living, Annabella owns and operates a business venture in the retail sector running a general store. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from selling a variety of different products such as canned goods, some food for snacks, noodles, eggs, salt, sugar and other daily use products in the local community. Annabella has been engaged in her business for over two years and earns approximately 2000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2010, Annabella joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Annabella has successfully repaid a previous loan from GDMPC. Annabella is requesting a new loan of 5000 PHP that will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This loan will be the second loan taken out by Annabella from GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of the borrower's family. 

About GDMPC:

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has four branches and three units offices covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Khon's Group

texts.en:
This village loan consists of nine people.  They are  located in Damrei Chhlang village in the Kandal province. This village selected Mrs. Khon N., who is 54 years old, as the village bank president. Each member of the village hopes to increase his or her income to improve the living of their family.
Mrs. Khon N. is a widow with a daughter who is a seamstress in a garment factory. She now lives with her son-in-law who is a motorbike repairman. 
Her son-in-law faces a problem in his business because he doesn’t have enough money to support it. Thus, Mrs. Khon N. decided to ask for a loan to buy an air pump for her son-in-law's current business.

loans.use: To buy an air pump for her son-in-law's current business

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
Emelyn G. is from the village of Eastern Wao, of Lanao del Sur. She is 38 years old. Emelyn is widowed and has three school-aged children. To make a living, Emelyn owns & operates a business venture in the retail sector operating a specialized retail store. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from buying and selling dried fish like danggit and pinikas in the local community. Emelyn has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 10000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2010, Emelyn joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Emelyn has successfully repaid a previous loan of 7000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to to invest in expanding the business. Emelyn is requesting a new loan of 10000 PHP that will be used to purchase additional dried fish & working capital. This loan will be the third loan taken out by Emelyn from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand the her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional dried fish & working capital

loans.name: Sagheeran's Group

texts.en:
Sagheeran is a very skillful lady. She operates her clothing embroidery business at her home to supplement the income of her family. The attractive element of her work is she makes hand-made embroidery on clothes. She crafts beautiful embroidery designs that her customers admire. She has been doing this business for over seven years. In this period of time, she has obtained a good reputation among her customers for producing quality work and fulfilling the commitments.   

She lives in Gujranwala with her family in a two room brick house. Gujranwala is an industrial city of Pakistan. She is married to M. Y. who is a government employee and works on meager income. She is the mother of two daughters. Both have learned the art of embroidery from their mother and now help her in her business.  

She has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner, Asasah, for her embroidery business. She will utilize the loan money in purchasing embroidery material such as beads, colored thread and clothes in bulk quantity that will help her fulfilling customer demand and earn more income.  

She hopes that an increased profit will help her in collecting dowry for the marriage of her eldest daughter. She is a new loan applicant of Asasah. She hopes that this will be a profitable experience for her.  

Note: In the photo, the lady who has holds a book (called Asasah Passbook) in her hands is Sagheeran.

loans.use: To buy embroidery items for embroidery business

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma R. is from the village of Eastern, Wao, Lanao del Sur. She is 64 years old. Gemma is widowed and has four adult-aged children. To make a living, Gemma owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) shop. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from buying and selling several kind of noodles, like bihon and miki, salt per quarter and half grams, and beverages like soft drinks, in the local community. Gemma has been engaged in her business for over seven years and earns approximately 10,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2010, Gemma joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Gemma has successfully repaid a previous loan of 7,000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to to invest in expanding the business. Gemma is requesting a new loan of 9,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional inventory and working capital. This loan will be the third loan taken out by Gemma from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand it.

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory and working capital

loans.name: Suon Sophea's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Suon S. is a 40-year-old, married woman and she has been selected as the village bank president by its 15 members. They live in Damrei Chlang village, Kandal province. Each members of the group will use their portion of the loan to support their different purposes.

Mrs. Suon S. is a laborer in the local village. Her husband, Mr. Mann Mao, 52, works as a construction worker. With their both occupations, they are not able to earn enough income to support their family. 

In their family, they have an old motorbike for going to work everyday but the motorbike is now getting old so they need to pay extra money on petroleum. In order to reduce her expenses, Mrs. Suon S. would like to ask for a loan to buy a new motorcycle for going to work. This couple has seven children: one is a seamstress in a garment factory, one works in a bakery, and three are attending the local school, while the others are too young to study or work.

loans.use: To purchase a new motorcycle for transportation.

loans.name: Estrellita

texts.en:
Estrellita M. is from the village of Poblacion 2, Banisilan, South Cotabato. She is 41 years old. Estrellita is married and has four school-aged children. To make a living, Estrellita owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) shop. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from buying and selling biscuits, milk and chocolate drinks in sachets, snack foods, shampoos, soaps and detergents in the local community. Estrellita has been engaged in her business for over six years and earns approximately 10,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2010, Estrellita joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Estrellita has successfully repaid a previous loan of 8,000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to to invest in expanding the business. Estrellita is requesting a new loan of 11,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional inventory and working capital. This loan will be the third one taken out by Estrellita from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue she generates to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory and working capital

loans.name: Zaib's Group

texts.en:
Zaib lives in a three-room brick house in Farid town which is a small housing colony of the city of Gujranwala. She moved here 10 years ago with her family. She is 41 years old and married to M. A. who is an employee in a factory earning a low income.  She is the mother of two sons and a daughter. Her elder son left his education after 10th class and started an embroidery business. He runs an embroidery shop in the market and makes good money from his work. Her other children are enrolled in a school and are getting their education.
 
Zaib supports her family by doing sewing. She is very talented in her art and receives a good number of orders every month. Her income allows her to pay the education expenses of her children. She also trains girls in her area in sewing skills. She has been training girls for over 5 years. 

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her business. With the loan, she will buy another sewing machine that will help her train more girls and make more income.  She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 2nd loan application. In her previous loan year she proved herself a responsible client who always paid installments on time and never missed a single meeting. 
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) in her hands is Zaib.

loans.use: To buy another sewing machine to train girls in sewing

loans.name: Yan's Group

texts.en:
This village loan consists of twelve members. They are located in Damrei Chhlang village, Kandal province. This village selected Mrs. K. Yan, 50 years old, as the village bank president. The members of this village bank hope that the loans will be improve their families' living conditions. 

Mrs. K. Yan and her husband, Mr. Leng Som, are fishermen who are able to earn an income to support the family. They also receive some income from two of their children. But their house is getting old. Thus, Mrs. K. Yan would like to ask for a loan to fix her house up. 

This couple has three children: one is a motorcycle taxi driver and one is a construction worker while another is attending the local school

loans.use: To fix the house up

loans.name: Levie

texts.en:
Levie C. is from the village of Eastern, Wao, Lanao del Sur. She is 25 years old. Levie is married and has one infant child. To make a living, Levie owns & operates a service-based business. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes from providing motorcycle or "habal-habal" services with her husband as the driver to local community members. Levie has been engaged in her business for over one year and earns approximately 10,000 PHP a month for these activities. In the picture, Levie is carrying her one-year-old daughter.

In 2010, Levie joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Levie has successfully repaid a previous loan of 8000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to to purchase materials needed to provide service. Levie is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase materials needed for the maintenance of their motorcycle. This will be the 4th loan taken out by Levie from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is an accredited partner of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and reaches out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase materials needed for the maintenance of their motorcycle

loans.name: Najma's Group

texts.en:
Najma comes from Gujranwala which is located in Punjab province and is famous  in Pakistan for its sweetmeats. She lives in a 3-room brick house with her family in the area called Farid town. She is a housewife, who stays at home and takes care of her household responsibilities. She is very active and receives great respect in the family for her supportive nature. She is married to M. I. who is a rickshaw driver. He provides transport services to his passengers and to school children and generates income for the family. As he is the only breadwinner for his family, this makes him even more responsible towards his work.  

Najma is the mother of a 3-year-old son. She spends most of her time taking care of him. She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s rickshaw. He will invest the loan in repairing his rickshaw because its engine is creating a problem and if it never gets repair in time it might seize up.  After the repair work, he will be able to do his job more efficiently and provide better service to his passengers. 

Najma is hopeful that this investment will bring good results for her husband’s business and her family will be able to enjoy better living conditions. She is a new loan applicant of Asasah and hopes that it will be a good experience for her. 

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) in her hands is Najma.

loans.use: To repair a rickshaw

loans.name: Norng's Group

texts.en:
This village loan consists of twelve members. They are located in Damrei Chhlang village, Kandal province.  This village loan group selected Mrs. Norng P., a 38-year-old married woman as the village bank president.

 Mrs. Norng P. and her husband, Mr. Sok Ne, are fishermen who are able to earn a good income to support the family. They now live in a house that is old and uncomfortable. Thus, Mrs. Norng P. would like to ask for a loan to add to her savings to fix her house up. This couple has four children: two are seamstresses in a garment factory while the other two are students in the local school.

loans.use: To add to her savings to fix her house up

loans.name: Sry

texts.en:
Mrs. Sry S. has been in the farming business for years in Kompong Cham Province. She plants various crops to earn a living and typically generates an income of $3 per day. Mrs. Sry S. is married to Lay Sophea, age 36, also a local farmer. This couple, who work together in the farming business, have given birth to two children, both single and still living under their roof. 

In the past, Mrs. Sry S. has always hired the neighbor’s cow to alleviate the chore of plowing their farmland. Right now, she hopes to buy her own cow and that is why she is applying for a loan from Kiva. Mrs. Srey Sokhum was not available the day of the photo, so her husband is in the photo instead.

loans.use: To buy her own cow for plowing

loans.name: Vit's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Vit K. is 65 years old. She has been selected as the village bank president by its nine members. They are living Damrei Chhlang village, Kandal province. Each member of the village will use their portion of the loan to support his or her different purposes. 

Mrs. Vit K. earns her living by operating three businesses: fish vending, vegetable vending and cake selling in the local market. Since these businesses are going well, she wants to expand them. So Mrs. Vit K. decided to ask for a loan to buy more fish and vegetables to support her businesses activities. Mrs. Vit K. is a widow without any children.

loans.use: To buy more fish and vegetables

loans.name: Phen

texts.en:
Mrs. Phen K. is a 58-year-old married woman who lives in Kompong Cham Province. She owns a piece of farmland that she inherited many years ago from her grandparents. Mrs. Phen K. is now married and has five school-aged kids. Her husband works in the farm fields frequently alongside her. She uses this land to grow different kinds of crops.

 Mrs. Phen K. planted rice and vegetable crops three months ago, but her crops are not growing well because they need more fertilizer. To remedy the situation, she would like a loan to buy two sacks of fertilizer and insecticides for her crops.

loans.use: To buy two sacks of fertilizer and insecticide for her crops
